import { Link } from '@material-ui/core' import { Create, Delete } from '@material-ui/icons' import React from 'react' import { useStateValue } from '../StateProvider'; export default function ViewOrders() { const [ { users, orders }, dispatch] = useStateValue(); console.log(users.map( user => orders.filter(order => user.userID === order.customerID) ) ) return ( <>

Cafe Kora Orders Catalog

Total Orders: {orders?.length }

{orders?.length ? <>
{/* SORT OPERATION ACCORDING TO CATEGORY, ALPGABETICAL ORDER, DATE ADDED, PRICE, SEARCH */}
{ orders.map( order => order.orderID && users?.map( user => ( ) ) ) }
Order ID Customer ID Date Ordered Order Quantity Order Total Action
{order.orderID} {user.userID === order.customerID && user.fname } {order.orderDate.toDate().toDateString()} {order.orderQty} {order.orderTotal}
